Entries.companion_Farm: What do you do after you've done all your farm work for the day? Any hobbies?
Entries.companion_Farm~1: Wow! You maintain all this by yourself? You're quite a hardworker aren't ya?
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy: Well atleast you don't have to water any crops today, right?
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy: Need any snow shoveling done? Might need more than just us two to handle all this though.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring: How do plan out when and what crops to plant? I admire how you and Jeric get it done!
Entries.companion_Farm_Summer: Back in days, Jeric and I would chill around the ice cream shop near the beach at Zuzu during the summer time.#$b#Though we had to save up a couple days before just for some good ice cream.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall: The governor usually likes to take vacations in their family getaway home during this season.#$b#Been there bunch of times ofcourse, it's quite homey.
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter: During this season, there's a spike of reports about a mysterious black figure lurking around Pelican Town.#$b#I wonder what the local authorities do to handle those reports.
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring~1: Season of flowers, huh?#$b#*Shudder* It reminds me of the time we were paranoid as the governor visited a garden of poisonous plants!$3
Entries.companion_Farm_Dating: Need any help around here, babe?
Entries.companion_Farm_Dating~1: How do you... milk cows?#$b#I've always been confused how exactly that's done.
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy_Dating: Hey, don't forget to use an umbrella, okay?#$b#I don't want you getting sick.$s
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy_Dating: Oh? Babe? You cold?#$b#Come here then!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Spouse: I've been thinking of installing some security cameras around the farm, babe.#$b#You wouldn't mind, right?
Entries.companion_Farm_Spouse~1: Paranoid? Me? Psh! Who said that?#$b#Now come help me set-up some electric fences I bought from Kenneth.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy_Spouse: Babe? Why are we staying out here in the rain?$6#$b#*sigh* Just don't get sick, okay?$a#$b#Don't worry though! I got your clumsy butt covered.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy_Spouse: Hey, clumsy baby.#$b#Watch your step around the slippery snow, alright?#$b#It's fine though, I won't ever get tired of catching you back up.$h
Entries.companion_Town: A small town like this has its perks, security-wise.#$b#Like you know everyone, so it's easier to trust.#$b#But don't ever be too lenient! Always stay alert regardless! Better safe than sorry!$h
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVill: I always did wonder... Who were the first family to have taken residence in this village?#$b#Maybe the Amethynes? Or maybe the Lidens?#$b#I saw a book at the library last time and saw that the Lidens were miners before they became farmers.#$b#So it got me thinking.
Hey, let's visit Jeric when we get the chance.#$b#I bet lil bro's quite lonely up there in his farm.$h#$b#Nah, who am I kidding? That extroverted charmer probably has some friends over again.$h
